type.name: T:Elysium.Parameters.Design
type.summary: Represents the class that controls theme's basic settings in design-time mode.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Design.Theme
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates current theme type in design-time mode.
property.value: It can be either one of the values of or null. It might be null when the control has to use the value that has been set for the entire application. Default value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Design.GetTheme(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: Current theme type for the specified control in design-time mode.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Design.SetTheme(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Nullable{Elysium.Theme})
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
The new theme type for the specified control.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Design.AccentBrush
property.summary: Gets or sets the accent colour in design-time mode.
property.value: The brush that contains the accent colour, or null, if the control has to use the value, which has been set for the entire application. Default value — null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Design.GetAccentBrush(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: Current accent colour for the specified control in design-time mode.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Design.SetAccentBrush(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
The accent colour for the specified control in construtor's mode.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Design.ContrastBrush
property.summary: Gets or sets the colour which is contrast to the accent colour in design-time mode.
property.value: The brush that contains the contrast colour, or null, if the control has to use the value, which has been set for the entire application. Default value — null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Design.GetContrastBrush(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: Current contrast colour for the specified control in design-time mode.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Design.SetContrastBrush(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
The contrast colour for the specified control in construtor's mode.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.
